character.data.zaurahel.name: Zaurahel
character.data.zaurahel.description: Zaurahel was living deep below the surface, lost in prayers to the Dark Gods when the Conjunction of the Planes disrupted the peace. Zaurahel took arms to cleanse the surface dwellers that do not belong there.
character.data.zaurahel.playstyle: Can trade Wounds for Mana or Cards.
character.data.zaurahel.description.visu: Dark elf with pointy hears. Wearing a long purple cape and scarf wrapped around his neck. He is also in full plate purple mithril armor with spiky paldrons, a large diamond-shaped blue gem in the center and a long mask covering his face fully. He is carrying a heavy-looking shield made of pink and purple crystals. The center of the shield has a silver sygil on it, likely the symbol of his clan. His sword is slightly curved, between a scimitar and a long sword, with the same diamond-shape blue gem as his armor.
